message.content: {"given_definition_quality":20,"better_definition":"(noun) day; the basic unit of the date in Chinese","sentence":"今天日好。","image_prompt":"A bright, round sun in the sky over a peaceful cityscape, with soft apocalyptic lighting casting long, gentle shadows; people and small children in simple clothes walking beneath the sky, with gentle, hopeful expressions. Animated in a soft apocalypse style: slightly surreal, warm pastel colors, subtle hints of nature reclaiming the city.","sentence_translation":"Today the day is good."}
